name: BullyWoolly
0:
”Alexa open Bully Woolly”
”Choose the lunchroom”
”Select the park”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bully woolly
des:
Bullying is rampant in many schools and knowing how to handle new and different situations can be daunting for young kids. Help better prepare your child for the real world with a bit of virtual exposure.

From peer pressure situations, to standing up for others, to empathy lessons, Bully Woolly takes place across three locations: the park, the lunchroom, and the bus. Each location includes three levels where they have to answer yes or no questions in order to progress. Upon completion of each level the player will be rewarded with a badge in the game that signifies their accomplishments.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
